entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
